thread.title: Asia fears a trade war over planned U.S. trade tax

title: Asia fears a trade war over planned U.S. trade tax
text:
Asia fears a trade war over planned U.S. trade tax 5:52am EST - 01:44 
Asian countries are speaking out about their concerns over U.S. President Donald Trump's planned tariffs on steel and aluminum, including the risk of retaliatory measures, as exporters look for more details on the plans.   
Asian countries are speaking out about their concerns over U.S. President Donald Trump's planned tariffs on steel and aluminum, including the risk of retaliatory measures, as exporters look for more details on the plans.  //reut.rs/2oKJAOf
